reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 527/18: PUBLICATION OF COMMUNITY SAFETY AND WELL-BEING PLANS
reg_info.reg_name_text: PUBLICATION OF COMMUNITY SAFETY AND WELL-BEING PLANS

content.content: 1. (1) A municipal council shall publish its community safety and well-being plan on the Internet within 30 days after adopting it. (2) On and after the day of publication, the municipal council shall make a printed copy of the adopted plan available for review by anyone who requests it. (3) For greater certainty, the municipal council may publish the plan in any other manner or form it desires.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) A municipal council shall publish its community safety and well-being plan on the Internet within 30 days after adopting it.

(2) On and after the day of publication, the municipal council shall make a printed copy of the adopted plan available for review by anyone who requests it.

(3) For greater certainty, the municipal council may publish the plan in any other manner or form it desires.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
